channel.title: A Few Errors
channel.description: My souce is project insanity. How do i make it so people cannot use commands such as ::home or ::donorzone to get out of jail? Also they cant see text while in jail. Another problem people can still ::yell while ipmuteD? Help with these pleasE?

item.description:

in client.java, silly. just look for the other “in(Something)”.

sorry if i’m not making the most sense, i’m doing a project for my English class and this is all from memory.

item.title: A Few Errors
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

add && (requirement).

for example if(command.startsWith("duel") && playerRights >1){

if the commands “duel” and the player rights are greater than one,

showInterface(6575); for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) duelEquipment(playerEquipment[i], playerEquipmentN[i], i);

for the yell, add something like && != IPMuted.

i’m sure there’s a tut on it somewhere, that’s the best i got off the top of my head. best of luck, man.

BUT, i know how to do make it so they can’t teleport.

find something like public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) {
i’m not sure what it is for you, but it can’t be that different

add if (inJail()) { sM("You can't teleport out of the bounty hunter crater!"); return; }

make sure you declare inJail somewhere, though.

[code]public boolean inJail() {
if (absX >= 1111 && absX <= 1111 && absY >= 11111 && absY <=11111) {
return true;

} else {
  return false;
}

}[/code]

i just used ones for sake of saving time. make it your actual grid for your “jail”.

best of luck, again.

Read full topic
